content.rendered:
Humanitarian Awards

  • Citizen of the Year, Miami Beach Chamber of Commerce 2022
  • Jan Karski Medal , Poland 2022
  • Town of Surfside Proclamation 2022
  • Dade County Proclamation 2022
  • Key to City of Miami, for Efforts during Hurricane Irma and Maria: October 6, 2018
  • Merit of Values & Excellency Award from the Foundation of the Americas.
  • Fundraising Trailblazer, American Red Cross Greater Miami & The Keys: 2002
  • Honored, American Red Cross Greater Miami & The Keys: 2004
  • Changing Lives Award, Miami Rescue Mission: 2007
  • Building Communities And Rebuilding Lives Award Of Excellence, Developers & Builders Alliance: 2007
  • Community Excellence Hospitality, March Of Dimes: 2008
  • Community Partnership Award, Florida Campus Compact: 2009
  • Power Player, Florida International Magazine: 2009
  • Heart Of Gold Sponsor, The Wellness Community: 2009
  • Honorary Chairman, The Wellness Community: 2010
  • Humanitarian Award, Miami International Fashion Week: 2010
  • Starfish Award, United Way: 2011
  • Miami Magic Honoree, Junior League Of Miami: 2011
  • Humanitarian Of The Year, Sustainatopia: 2011
  • Honored For Work In Haiti, Fashion Miami: 2011
  • Philanthropist Of The Year, Shuzz: 2011
  • Honored, Make-A-Wish Foundation: 2012
  • Honored For Work In Haiti, The Edeyo Foundation: 2012
  • Philanthropist, Women In The Arts: 2016
  • Global Empowerment Mission Dedication Day, City Of Miami Beach: April 8, 2017
